Title: Unlock the Reaper scroll
Description: Unlocked in the Reaper store for 250 Reaper Points. It permanently increases the Slayer XP received from reaper tasks by 50%.

Title: Unlock the Reaper's choice perk
Description: Unlocked in the Reaper store for 250 Reaper Points. It gives you a 10% chance of being able to choose your assignment when receiving a new one. Rerolled assignments also have this chance.

Title: Obtain a Portable Obelisk from a Sack of wild rewards
Description: Sacks of wild rewards are awarded on completion of Wilderness Flash Events. Special events will award multiple sacks and give an additional Sack of very wild rewards after the final stage.

Title: Obtain the Supreme hunter's helm
Description: The helm can be bought from the Slayer Bounty & Deathmatch Reward Shop for 1,500 Deathmatch points after becoming the Supreme hunter at least once.

Title: Obtain the Infinity ethereal outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Runecrafting level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Runecrafting training from a Runecrafting level of 70.

Title: Spot the raven named Bran
Description: Bran is a crystal raven that may be found on Tarddiad by players who have unlocked the Ravensworn title.

ID: If Bran does not appear but you meet all the requirements, you may check off this task.

Description: For this tier of clue the mahogany treasure chest is sufficient. It requires a Construction level of 84. For slots requiring multiple items, all items must have been collected before they can be stored as a set.

Title: Upgrade the Trimmed Completionist cape to its Master variant
Description: If you've previously claimed the Master Max Cape, admire the tomb in Falador park. Otherwise, you'll need to craft the Blurite keystone.

Title: Discover all islands in the Player-Owned Ports
Description: In each region you discover in the Player-Owned Ports minigame there is an additional island that needs to be found. These islands are Cyclosis, Siren's Shell, Chimera Straits, Wind's Home, Crescent Isle, Shambling Lair, Light Under Sea and Exile's Point. You should be able to check your archipelago map on your Captain's Log to see what islands are missing.

Title: Find out the outcome of the continued research by Vicendithas
Description: This requires you to talk with Vicendithas at the Incubator each month for 12 months.

ID: After completion of Extinction, the research can be accelerated by paying 50,000 of each Anachronia resource to unlock additional chapters without having to wait for the monthly reset.
Description: Hard

Title: Find the Necklace of Salamancy in the Dream of Iaia
Description: The necklace can be found while using the skilling stations. There is a 1/500 chance to receive the necklace when base camp resources are rolled.

Title: Help Pastkeeper Sharrigan to remember all stories within the Dream of Iaia
Description: New memories have a rare chance of triggering when skilling at the skilling stations within the Dream of Iaia. Skilling at the stations require Anachronia base camp resources. This task benefits from the lorehound's "Lore Helper" perk.

Title: Obtain a full set of Witchdoctor equipment
Description: The top or legs are obtained from Papa Mambo by catching all non-God Jadinkos within 1 week, requiring a Hunter level of 81. Additionally catching the three God Jadinkos requires a Hunter level of 81 and will reward you with the mask. The ten normal Jadinkos can be caught on Anachronia as well as in the Herblore Habitat hunter area, while the God set are only found on Karamja.

Title: Obtain a pair of Achto Primeval Gloves

Title: Obtain a pair of Achto Teralith Boots

Title: Obtain a pair of Rogue boots
Description: Rogue boots are obtainable as a rare reward by searching fallen rubble in the Flash Powder Factory. They can be used as an alternative to the factory boots, decreasing the chance of failing to pass an obstacle in the factory by 30%.

Title: Obtain a pair of Rogue gloves
Description: Rogue gloves are obtainable as a rare reward by searching fallen rubble in the Flash Powder Factory. They provide the same bonus as the factory gloves when worn within the factory, increasing the chance of successfully pickpocketing other players by 10%.

Title: Obtain a pair of Rogue trousers
Description: Rogue trousers are obtainable as a rare reward by searching fallen rubble in the Flash Powder Factory. They provide the same bonus as the factory trousers when worn within the factory, granting the player an extra three catalytic powder at the beginning of a game.

Title: Obtain a Rogue mask
Description: The Rogue mask is obtainable as a rare reward by searching fallen rubble in the Flash Powder Factory. It provides the same bonus as the factory mask when worn within the factory, reducing the chance of failing to find an item in fallen rubble by 15%.

Title: Obtain a Rogue top
Description: The rogue top is obtainable as a rare reward by searching fallen rubble in the Flash Powder Factory. The rogue top provides the same bonus as a factory top when worn within the factory, granting the player an extra two minutes on the timer.

Title: Obtain all Circus clothing
Description: A new piece can be obtained from each of the five D&Ds in the Circus weekly.

Title: Obtain all Eastern scrolls from Player-Owned Ports

Note, the Wildy Wyrm event also gives slayer xp and Wyrm reward glands which cannot be opened for these tasks.

Title: Attempt to attach an Armadyl Hilt to a damaged Prototype Godsword
Description: A Prototype Godsword can be obtained from completing the Armadylean special research which require 95 Archaeology. An Archaeology level of 112 is required to excavate it. A Stormguard Gerege must be added to your tool belt to complete this task.

Title: Claim 25 rewards from the Motherlode Maw in the Edimmu resource dungeon
Description: A Dungeoneering level of 115 is required. The Motherlode Maw can be looted once a day.

Title: Complete a total of 200 collections
Description: Completing any collection, done by handing it in in its entirety, counts, including the same collection many times over.

Title: Complete the entirety of the General section in your Slayer collection log
Description: Good luck on the passive drops!

Title: Excavate a total of 2500 artefacts
Description: All artefacts excavated by you count.

Title: Fill a total of 20 slots in the magic wardrobe in your Player-owned House
Description: To fill a total of 20 slots, a marble wardrobe is required. This can be constructed with a Construction level of 96.

Title: Fill a total of 37 slots in the easy compartment of your treasure chest in your Player-owned House
Description: For this tier of clue the oak treasure chest is sufficient. It requires a Construction level of 48. For slots requiring multiple items, all items must have been collected before they can be stored as a set.

Title: Fill a total of 41 slots in the medium compartment of your treasure chest in your Player-owned House
Description: For this tier of clue the teak treasure chest is sufficient. It requires a Construction level of 66. For slots requiring multiple items, all items must have been collected before they can be stored as a set.

Title: Obtain the Completionist cape
Description: The cape can be obtained by completing all Completionist achievements.

Title: Obtain the Completionist cape (t)
Description: The cape can be obtained by completing all Trimmed completionist cape achievements.

Title: Obtain the Golden Soul cape
Description: Completion of the Nomad's Elegy quest is required. Defeat the Memory of Nomad encounter in under 6 minutes.

Title: Obtain the Master quest cape
Description: The cape can be obtained by completing all Master quest cape achievements.

Title: Read all ability codices
Description: Do as the title says. The codices included can be found in the linked wiki-article. Some of them has to be obtained and read several times, e.g. the Praesul ability codex. If both tradeable and untradeable versions exist, the former can be ignored.

Title: Read all the Murals in the Sunken Pyramid
Description: A Slayer level of 99 is required. A minimum of 110 souls must be captured and registered in your Slayerdex.

Title: Unlock the 'Salty' title
Description: The title can be obtained by completing most content in The Arc.

Title: Unlock the 'Sandy' title
Description: The title can be unlocked by completing most content in Menaphos.

Title: Unlock the Battle Robes of Cruor
Description: The outfit is unlocked by using the intricate blood stained chest, which is obtained as a drop from Nex: Angel of Death.

Title: Unlock the Battle Robes of Fumus
Description: The outfit is unlocked by using the intricate smoke shrouded chest, which is obtained as a drop from Nex: Angel of Death.

Title: Unlock the Battle Robes of Glacies
Description: The outfit is unlocked by using the intricate ice chest, which is obtained as a drop from Nex: Angel of Death.

Title: Unlock the Battle Robes of Umbra
Description: The outfit is unlocked by using the intricate shadow chest, which is obtained as a drop from Nex: Angel of Death.

Title: Unlock the Malevolence, Desolation, Affliction, and Ruination curses
Description: A total of 4 Praesul codices are required to unlock the Malevolence, Desolation, Affliction, and Ruination curses.

Title: Upgrade Zez for the fifth time
Description: Zez upgrades for the fifth time upon reaching 30k total Runescore.

Title: Purchase a Max cape
Description: Purchasing a Max cape costs 2,772k gp. It can be purchased from Max, who can be found roaming around Varrock, or alternatively, Elen, who can be found in the Max Guild in Prifddinas.

Title: Obtain the Death Scythe
Description: Unlocked upon completion of 100 Reaper assignments.

Title: Obtain the Mahjarrat aura
Description: Unlocked in the Reaper store for 1,000 Reaper Points. It increases the damage you deal and divine location cap by 5% for one hour each day.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight top to its Superior Elite version
Description: The superior elite void knight top is an upgraded version of the elite void knight top which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on an elite void knight top. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points. Elite void knight top is an upgraded version of the regular Void knight top, which becomes available upon completion of The Void Stares Back. The Elite void knight top is given for free as a quest reward. Additionally, it can be made by taking a void knight top to Commodore Tyr and asking him to upgrade it to an Elite void knight top, at a cost of 100 commendations.. You may upgrade the Elite void knight top from the quest to it's Superior elite version to complete this task.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight robe to its Superior Elite version
Description: The Superior elite void knight robe is an upgraded version of the elite void knight robe which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on an Elite void knight robe. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points. The Elite void knight robe is an upgraded version of regular Void knight robe which becomes available upon completion of The Void Stares Back. They are obtained by taking Void knight robe to Commodore Tyr and asking him to upgrade them to Elite void knight robe, at a cost of 100 commendations.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight deflector to its superior version
Description: The Superior void knight deflector is an upgraded version of the void knight deflector which can be made by using a void knight armour patch on a void knight deflector. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight mage helm to its superior version
Description: The Superior void knight mage helm is an upgraded version of the void knight mage helm which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on a void knight mage helm. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight melee helm to its superior version
Description: The Superior void knight melee helm is an upgraded version of the void knight melee helm which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on a void knight melee helm. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points.

Title: Upgrade a Void knight ranger helm to its superior version
Description: The Superior void knight ranger helm is an upgraded version of the void knight ranger helm which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on a void knight ranger helm. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points.

Title: Obtain the Mortar Board
Description: Unlocked upon gaining the 50th training point in Boss assistance. Points are awarded if you have more than 10 kills in the boss, and other team members have less than 10.

Title: Unlock the 'the Master' title
Description: Unlocked upon gaining the 250th training point in Boss assistance. Points are awarded if you have more than 10 kills in the boss, and other team members have less than 10.

Title: Have two Vitalis pets try to fight one another
Description: For this to happen you and another player must come together, each being followed by a Vitalis pet.

Title: Unlock all variants of the monkey greegree
Description: There are a total of 8 variants. The bones can be obtained by killing certain types of monkeys. The only exception is the ancient gorilla, for which the required skull can only be obtained as loot from zombie implings. A real banksaver: combine your greegrees!

Title: Upgrade Zez for the fourth time
Description: Zez upgrades for the fourth time upon reaching 25k total Runescore.

Title: Unlock the reskinned-variant of the Miso pet
Description: The skin for Miso is unlocked after defeating Rasial 1,000 times.

Title: Hand in Rune dust to a Runesphere 25 times
Description: The dust can be banked and any amount can be handed in to progress the achievement. Dust can only be handed in once per day.

Title: Spot Mod Raven in Um
Description: Mod Raven can be found at the top of the clocktower in the City of Um on days when ravens can be found (every 13 days) after you have unlocked the Ravensworn title. Talking to him adds 25 souls to the Well of Souls.

Title: Adopt Sheldon
Description: Sheldon can be adopted after spying on 80 penguins around the world.

Title: Become the Ultimate Birdwatcher by having at least 50 Penguin points at once
Description: Peek-a-boo!

Title: Buy Mad Ramblings (1) and Mad Ramblings (2) from Barbarian Assault
Description: The Mad Ramblings can be bought from Commander Connad for a total of 50 Honour points in any role.

Title: Fully exhaust all gathering plots in a match of Stealing Creation
Description: This achievement is most easily done with the "Fast Sc" discord.

Title: Obtain 1,250 rank points in Conquest
Description: Conquest rewards commendations which can be used to buy parts of the Void knight armour sets.

Title: Obtain 100 Soul Fragments within Soul Wars and offer them all at once to the Soul Obelisk
Description: Soul fragments are obtained by killing jellies and pyrefiends during the minigame and offering them all at once to the Soul Obelisk at the centre of the minigame.

Title: Obtain a Fighter hat
Description: The hat can be obtained by exchanging 275 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.

Title: Obtain a Fighter torso
Description: The torso can be obtained by exchanging 375 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame, or 150 thaler with Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain a Healer hat
Description: The hat can be obtained by exchanging 275 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.

Title: Obtain a pair of Penance gloves
Description: These gloves can be obtained by exchanging 150 Honour Points of each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame, or 60 thaler with Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain a pair of Runner boots
Description: The boots can be obtained by exchanging 100 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame, or 40 thaler with Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain a Penance skirt
Description: The skirt can be obtained by exchanging 375 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame, or 150 thaler with Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain a Ranger hat
Description: The hat can be obtained by exchanging 275 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.

Title: Obtain a Runner hat
Description: The hat can be obtained by exchanging 275 Honour Points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.

Title: Obtain a Void knight ranger helm
Description: The Void knight ranger helm is obtained as a reward from the Pest Control and Conquest minigames. It can be bought from a Void Knight for 200 commendation points or bought from Stanley Limelight for 240 thaler. Players must have also have at least 42 Attack, Strength, Defence, Constitution, Ranged, Magic and 22 Prayer to buy and wear one.

Title: Obtain the Basic decorative set and sword
Description: The set can be bought from Lanthus for 29 silver Castle Wars tickets.

Title: Obtain the Briefcase of disguises
Description: The briefcase is unlocked by spying on 60 penguins around the world.

Title: Obtain the Castle Wars flag cape
Description: The cape can be bought from Lanthus for 2 silver Castle Wars tickets after capturing the most flags in a game of Castle Wars.

Title: Obtain the Castle Wars kills cape
Description: The cape can be bought from Lanthus for 2 silver Castle Wars tickets after achieving the highest amount of kills in a game of Castle Wars.

Title: Obtain the full Commander's Uniform
Description: The uniform can be bought for 150 Thaler from Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain the full Factory outfit
Description: The set can be bought from Brian O'Richard for 10,800 Brian points or from Stanley Limelight for 1,200 Thaler. P.S.: The mask makes rogue equipment, required for another passive, ten times as common.

Title: Obtain the full Lord marshal's Uniform
Description: The uniform can be bought for 150 Thaler from Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain the full Serjeant's Uniform
Description: The uniform can be bought for 150 Thaler from Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain the full War-chief's Uniform
Description: The uniform can be bought for 150 Thaler from Stanley Limelight.

Title: Obtain the Gud raider axe
Description: The axe is obtained as a very rare drop from Goblin raids. The raids happen twice an hour.

Title: Obtain the Gud raider chainbody
Description: The body is obtained as a very rare drop from Goblin raids. The raids happen twice an hour.

Title: Obtain the Gud raider shield
Description: The shield is obtained as a very rare drop from Goblin raids. The raids happen twice an hour.

Title: Obtain the Herb bag
Description: The bag can be bought from the Herby Werby reward shop for 200 Spirit points.

Title: Obtain the Penance master horn
Description: This free item can be obtained from Commander Connad at Barbarian Assault after reaching level 5 in any role.

Title: Obtain the Saradomin team cloak
Description: The cape can be bought from Lanthus for 10 silver Castle Wars tickets.

Title: Obtain the Saradomin team hood
Description: The hood can be bought from Lanthus for 10 silver Castle Wars tickets.

Title: Obtain the Zamorak team cloak
Description: The cape can be bought from Lanthus for 10 silver Castle Wars tickets.

Title: Obtain the Zamorak team hood
Description: The hood can be bought from Lanthus for 10 silver Castle Wars tickets.

Title: Play as the listed familiars in Familiarisation
Description: Owning a full Shaman's outfit makes playing as a new familiar more likely.

Title: Purchase the 4 different Penance Egg paints
Description: Each paint only needs to be purchased once, meaning the total costs is 200 points in any Barbarian Assault role. These paints can be used on the dark bow and abyssal whip.

Title: Store the King and Queen help books in your PoH
Description: The books are stored in your PoH upon defeating the Barbarian Assault King and Queen respectively.

Title: Unlock all abilities from Cabbage Facepunch Bonanza
Description: Abilities can be purchased from the reward shop costing between 275 and 550 renown.

Title: Unlock the 'of the Goebies' title
Description: Requires 3,000 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Unlock the 'Spymaster' title
Description: The title is unlocked by spying on 70 penguins around the world.

Title: Unlock the Storm Barn and its extensions
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 5,000 (barn deeds), 20,000 (extension 1) and 60,000 (extension 2) beans for a total of 85,000.

Title: Show Trevor to Granny then buy him back from her
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 10,000 beans after completing the achievement 'Ever So Clever'. Animal trait re-rollers can be used to get the Loyal trait on your Magical Zygomite and a name re-roller to give him the name Trevor.

Title: Upgrade a Fighter hat to its hardened version
Description: The hardened fighter hat is an upgraded version of the fighter hat which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a fighter hat. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a Fighter torso to its hardened version
Description: The hardened fighter torso is an upgraded version of the fighter torso which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a fighter torso. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a Healer hat to its hardened version
Description: The hardened healer hat is an upgraded version of the healer hat which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a healer hat. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a pair of Penance gloves to its hardened version
Description: Hardened penance gloves are an upgraded version of the penance gloves which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a pair of penance gloves. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a pair of Runner boots to its hardened version
Description: The hardened runner boots are an upgraded version of the runner boots which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a pair of runner boots. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a Penance skirt to its hardened version
Description: The hardened penance skirt is an upgraded version of the penance skirt which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a penance skirt. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a Ranger hat to its hardened version
Description: The hardened ranger hat is an upgraded version of the ranger hat which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a ranger hat. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Upgrade a Runner hat to its hardened version
Description: The hardened runner hat is an upgraded version of the runner hat which can be made by using a barbarian assault armour patch on a runner hat. Barbarian assault armour patches can be purchased from Commander Connad for 100 Honour points in any role.

Title: Win a Pest Control game after repairing all Barricades to full
Description: This can be done at any difficulty. Ask in the Clan chat or Discord server if anyone wants to help.

Title: Breed an Evil chicken
Description: When a male and a female chicken spend a lot of time together, and they really like each other, the cock might decide to do something evil.

Title: Complete the Cow breeding log
Description: Completing the log requires all variants of the species to be bred, shinies included.

Title: Complete the Frog breeding log
Description: Completing the log requires all variants of the species to be bred, shinies included.

Title: Complete the Sheep breeding log
Description: Completing the log requires all variants of the species to be bred, shinies included.

Title: Construct the Breeding pen on the Ranch Out of Time
Description: Bought from Prehistoric Potterington at the Ranch Out of Time for 1,000 beans. Requires 42 Farming to buy the pen deed and 55 Construction alongside 100,000 wood, vines and stone from the Anachronia base camp to build the pen.

Title: Obtain the Helm of Little Kings
Description: The Mask of Reflection can be bought from the Shattered Worlds shop for 3,500,000 Anima. 500 Basilisks must be killed to upgrade it to the helm. Once you own the mask, you're allowed to slay the required amount of monsters needed to upgrade it, once you have obtained all uniques more common than 1/2,000. They require a Slayer level of 40 to harm.

Title: Obtain the Helm of the Dagannoth
Description: The Mask of the Dagannoth can be bought from the Shattered Worlds shop for 40,000,000 Anima. 1,000 Dagannoth must be killed to upgrade it to the helm. Once you own the mask, you're allowed to slay the required amount of monsters needed to upgrade it, once you have obtained all uniques more common than 1/2,000.

Title: Obtain the Helm of the Dead Hand
Description: The Mask of Broken Fingers can be bought from the Shattered Worlds shop for 500,000 Anima. 100 Crawling hands must be killed to upgrade it to the helm. Once you own the mask, you're allowed to slay the required amount of monsters needed to upgrade it, once you have obtained all uniques more common than 1/2,000. They require a Slayer level of 5 to harm.

Title: Obtain the Helm of the Troll
Description: The Mask of the Troll can be bought from the Shattered Worlds shop for 100,000 Anima. 100 Trolls must be killed to upgrade the mask to the helm. Once you own the mask, you're allowed to slay the required amount of monsters needed to upgrade it.

Title: Obtain the Jellyhead
Description: The Mask of Gelatin can be bought from the Shattered Worlds shop for 5,500,000 Anima. 600 Jellies must be killed to upgrade it to the helm. Once you own the mask, you're allowed to slay the required amount of monsters needed to upgrade it. They require a Slayer level of 52 to harm.

Title: Put your basic decorative armour on display in the skill hall of your Player-owned house
Description: This requires the basic decorative helm, platebody and shield, as well as 2 oak planks and a Construction level of 28.

Title: Put your detailed decorative armour on display in the skill hall of your Player-owned house
Description: This requires the detailed decorative helm, platebody and shield, as well as 2 oak planks and a Construction level of 28.

Title: Put your intricate decorative armour on display in the skill hall of your Player-owned house
Description: This requires the intricate decorative helm, platebody and shield, as well as 2 oak planks and a Construction level of 28.

Title: Put your profound decorative armour on display in the skill hall of your Player-owned house
Description: This requires the profound decorative helm, platebody and shield, as well as 2 oak planks and a Construction level of 28.

Title: Unlock access to the bank at the waterfall on Mazcab
Description: Requires 1,500 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Unlock the 'the Iceborn' title
Description: Defeat the Arch-Glacor at 500% enrage. Good luck.

Title: Unlock the 'the Reputable' title
Description: Requires 1,250 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Unlock the ability to place your house on Mazcab
Description: Requires 1,750 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Unlock the second batch of fast travel routes on Mazcab
Description: Requires 2,000 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Unlock the Supply Discount+ at the Mazcab Emergency Merchants
Description: Requires 1,000 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Hear all of Thalmund's tales
Description: Thalmund has 7 tales to tell, and will tell you one tale a week when he appears on Wednesdays. Why not check out his stock while you're there?

Title: Check out the School of Jewels
Description: A Crafting level of 79 is required.

Title: Die by the Blade!
Description: Get killed by a Hanto sellsword in the Temple of Aminishi. Not safe for hardcores! Ensure you have an extra life.

Title: Don't skip a towers puzzle
Description: Solve a towers puzzle while completing master clue scrolls.

Title: Find a Cyclosis Cockatiel
Description: Find this bird for your Arc Journal on Thursdays - on Cyclosis at the south-eastern beach.

Title: Find a Pumpkin Limpkin
Description: Find this bird for your Arc Journal - while foraging mushroom clusters or berry bushes throughout the Arc.

Title: Hand in a total of at least 1,000 effigy materials to Vicendithas
Description: These materials can be gathered outside of the 5 minute timespan of the D&D. It is best to do this beforehand in preparation.

Title: Obtain Blue the pupper
Description: Unlocked in Zaida's Treasure Trails Reward shop for 2,500 Treasure Trail points.

Title: Obtain the Elder divination outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Divination level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Divination training from a Divination level of 70.

Title: Obtain the Expert Farmer rank
Description: Requires 75,000 reputation. Reputation is gained when carrying out most activities granting Farming experience.

Title: Obtain the Fury shark outfit and unlock all its effects
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Fishing level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Fishing training from a Fishing level of 70. Equip the full regular fishing outfit once to unlock its benefits on the elite outfit.

Title: Obtain the Magic golem outfit and unlock all its effects
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Mining level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Mining training from a Mining level of 70. Equip the full golden mining outfit once to unlock its benefits on the elite outfit.

Title: Obtain the Master camouflage outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Thieving level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Thieving training from a Thieving level of 70.

Title: Obtain the Master farmer outfit and unlock all its effects
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Farming level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Farming training from a Farming level of 70 or from the Farmer's Market. Equip the full regular farmers outfit once to unlock its benefits on the elite outfit.

Title: Obtain the Nature's sentinel outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Woodcutting level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Woodcutting training from a Woodcutting level of 70.

Title: Obtain the Volcanic trapper outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Hunter level of 80. You will need a total of 54,000 fragments gathered during Hunter training from a Hunter level of 70.

Title: Obtain the Warped gorajan trailblazer outfit
Description: Creating the outfit require an Invention level of 20 and a Dungeoneering level of 80. You will need a total of 72,000 fragments gathered during Dungeoneering training from a Dungeoneering level of 70. You will also need to buy the blueprint from the Elite Dungeon shop for 200,000 dungeoneering tokens.

Title: Purchase the Bountiful Harvest permanent unlock
Description: Gives certain plants a 50% chance to produce an additional item per harvest. It can be purchased from Sydekix at the Garden of Kharid, costing 15,000 Crux Eqal favour.

Title: Purchase the Everlasting Incense permanent unlock
Description: Incense stick bonuses will no longer be lost on death. It can be purchased from Sydekix at the Garden of Kharid, costing 35,000 Crux Eqal favour.

Title: Purchase the Speedy Growth permanent unlock
Description: Herb patches skip their first growth cycle, reducing their growth time by 20 minutes. It can be purchased from Sydekix at the Garden of Kharid, costing 25,000 Crux Eqal favour.

Title: Set foot in the world of the beanionnaires
Description: Obtain a grand total of 1,000,000 Beans.

Title: Tune a Bane sword into either its Revenant, Dragon or Abyssal bane variant
Description: This is accomplished by combining a bane (2h) sword +4 with draconic visages (dragon bane), abyssal whips (abyssal bane), or corrupted variants of the Statius or Vesta weapons (revenant bane). The 2h sword requires two identical items.

Title: Complete the group PvM requirements for the Hard tier
Description: 11 out of 14 group PvM uniques, and 2 out of 2 group PvM achievements are required to progress. You may not complete this task or make progress towards any tasks above Hard tier, including whatever your current active task was, until the requirements have been met.

ID: Make a ticket in #gpvm-progress-requests to contact the Taskman Team once you think you're done!
Description: Hard

Title: Activate any totem along the Anachronia coast
Description: Once you have found the three pieces of any totem (except the remototem, which can only be built in the base camp) complete the ritual to activate it.

Title: Complete each of the 14 unique Wilderness Flash Events
Description: The events are on a fixed rotation. Use the in-game achievement "Far-Reaching and Wild-Ranging" to track your progress.

Title: Construct the Remote Totem Charging Point in the base camp on Anachronia
Description: Requires 150,000 each of Wood, Vines and Stone as well as a complete Remototem. Note: Do not do this before completion of task DVW4 in Medium Tier!

Title: Do a freakin' excellent job on a construction contract!
Description: Earn 5 credits from a construction contract. Use only mahogany planks.

Title: Do a pretty crappy job on a construction contract
Description: Earn a single credit from completing a construction contract. Use only basic materials.

Title: Don't skip a lockbox puzzle
Description: Solve a lockbox puzzle while completing master clue scrolls.

Title: Fill a medium pen with one of each of the four seasonal rams
Description: The four seasonal rams can only be breed during it's specific season. The seasonaliser from the Farmers' Market can be used to change the season at the farm.

Title: Find Bubbles while training Fishing
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Find Crabbe while training Slayer
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Find Dojo Mojo while training Agility
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Find Flo while training Fletching
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Find Gemi while training Crafting
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Finish researching the Senntisten digsite

Title: Have 6 tier II animal perks active simultaneously at your farm

Alternatively completing the breeding log for an animal gives the tier 1 perk passively, so you can achieve this by completing 9 animal breeding logs.

Title: Become the Ruler of the Sea
Description: This is achieved by succesfully completing all Deep Sea Fishing encounters, these being the whale, the jellyfish invasion and the seamonster.

Title: Cast Ice barrage on a player 99 times in Castle Wars
Description: Freeze!

Title: Play a round of Great Orb Project on each different Runecrafting altar map
Description: You do not have to win each map, just participate. 50 Runecrafting is required to enter the Runecrafting guild and join the minigame!

Title: Show Malcolm to Granny
Description: Animal trait re-rollers can be used to get the chaotic trait on a Lizard Chicken hen, then use name re-rollers to change their name to Malcolm. Do it in this order, the other way around does not work.

Title: Unlock all the Emotes through the Members Loyalty Programme
Description: To buy all emotes, a total of 223,782 loyalty points are required.

Title: Unlock all three Multiple trait boosts
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 6,000 (small), 9,000 (medium) and 12,000 (Large) beans for a total of 27,000.

Title: Unlock Ancient teleport tablets
Description: The unlock can be bought from the Slayer Bounty & Deathmatch Reward Shop for 300 Deathmatch points. Requires completion of Desert Treasure.

Title: Unlock the 'the Enigmatologist' title
Description: Unlocked in Zaida's Treasure Trails Reward shop for 750 Treasure Trail points.

Title: Unlock the Bonfire booster
Description: Unlocked in the Reaper store for 250 Reaper Points or 2,500 Slayer Points. It permanently increases the duration of bonfire health boosts by 25%.

Title: Upgrade a pair of Void knight gloves to its superior version
Description: The Superior void knight gloves are an upgraded version of the void knight gloves which can be made by using a Void knight armour patch on void knight gloves. Void knight armour patches can be purchased from Void Knights for 200 Void Knight commendation points.

Title: Excavate at Kharid-Et while the Pylons are active
Description: An Archaeology level of 12 is required. Once the pylons have been charged to 100% there is a 30 minute time-span in which excavating at the Kharid-Et site has additional buffs.

Title: Obtain the Apprentice Farmer rank
Description: Requires 4,000 reputation. Reputation is gained when carrying out most activities granting Farming experience.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's footwear
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's handwear
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's headwear
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's headwear add-on
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's legwear
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Obtain the Diviner's robe
Description: The Diviner's outfit pieces can be obtained from participating in the Guthixian Cache D&D.

Title: Speak to Pickle the cat on the Manor farm when her mice kill count is in double digits
Description: Requires an amulet of catspeak.

Title: Unlock all the Colour changes through the Members Loyalty Programme
Description: To buy all re-colours, a total of 38,000 loyalty points are required.

Title: Unlock all the Outfits through the Members Loyalty Programme
Description: To buy all outfits, a total of 44,000 loyalty points are required.

Title: Unlock the first batch of fast travel routes on Mazcab
Description: Requires 750 reputation on Mazcab. Up to 90 reputation can be gained per day - 45 from Trinks' tasks and 45 from a complete Nemi Forest run.

Title: Upgrade your penguin spy device with the 'Zap' function
Description: The zap function is unlocked by spying on 40 penguins around the world.

Title: Achieve a perfect score when upgrading a building in Fort Forinthry
Description: This can be achieved by only making progress on the optimal building spot.

Title: Construct the tier 3 Bait box on Anachronia
Description: The cumulative costs are listed on the wiki-page.

Title: Construct the tier 3 Player lodge on Anachronia
Description: The cumulative costs are listed on the respective section on the wiki-page.

Title: Construct the tier 3 Sleeping quarters on Anachronia
Description: The cumulative costs are listed on the respective section on the wiki-page.

Title: Construct the tier 3 Storehouse on Anachronia
Description: The cumulative costs are listed on the respective section on the wiki-page.

Title: Construct the tier 3 Town Hall on Anachronia
Description: The cumulative costs are listed on the respective section on the wiki-page.

Title: Cure 100 animals on your farm
Description: Cure 100 diseased animals of their curses, coughs, chews and coronas

Title: Fill both small pens with rabbits
Description: Requires 12 rabbits total and both small pens bought.

Title: Find Gordie while training Dungeoneering
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Find Omen while training Necromancy
Description: Can be found while doing most exp-giving activities in the skill.

Title: Obtain the Competent Farmer rank
Description: Requires 25,000 reputation. Reputation is gained when carrying out most activities granting Farming experience.

Title: Obtain the Seedicide
Description: Seedicide costs 2,200 Cabbage Facepunch renown, 10,000 beans or 360 Thaler.

Title: Recruit Adam Antite for your Player-owned Farm
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 5,000 beans. Adam can be sent out to retrieve unchecked animals every 6 hours for 100 beans.

Title: Recruit Callia for your Player-owned Farm
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 2,500 beans. Callia can convert and store excess animals from a full breeding pen into unchecked versions.

Title: Recruit Handy for your Player-owned Farm
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 1,000 beans. Farmhands will stop animals from growing past the adolescent stage at the cost of beans.

Title: Recruit Thing for your Player-owned Farm
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 1,000 beans. Farmhands will stop animals from growing past the adolescent stage at the cost of beans.

Title: Squish a total of 200 Corrupted scarabs
Description: Squish a total of 200 Corrupted scarabs. The ‚Äòsoulobby‚Äô friends chat can assist with finding these.

Title: Unlock the 'Birdwatcher' title
Description: The title is unlocked by spying on 20 penguins around the world.

Title: Unlock the 'refresh ability cooldown' ability at the Altar of War
Description: Unlockable at War's Retreat once you reach 500 boss kills.

Title: Unlock the Altar of War at War's Retreat
Description: Unlocked in War's Wares after having at least 200 boss kills.

Title: Unlock the Boss portal at War's Retreat
Description: Unlocked in War's Wares after having at least 100 boss kills.

Title: Unlock the breeding perk for medium animal pens
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 3,000 beans.

Title: Unlock the Player-owned Farm status icons
Description: Bought from Granny Potterington at the Player-owned Farm for 1,500 beans. Talk to Granny Potterington to toggle this unlock on and off.

Title: Check out what's up for sail at the Deep Sea Fishing Merchant and make a purchase
Description: The mechant spawns randomly at the hub and stays for a few minutes before departing. Spawns are unique to worlds, so hopping to find him is an option.

Title: Don't skip a celtic knot
Description: Solve a celtic knot puzzle while completing elite clue scrolls.

Title: Don't skip a puzzle box
Description: Solve a puzzle box while completing hard or elite clue scrolls.

Title: Find all 12 Penguin spies and the Polar bear in a single week
Description: I see you Pee. You must talk to Chuck after finding everything to complete the achievement.

Title: Obtain the Practiced Farmer rank
Description: Requires 10,000 reputation. Reputation is gained when carrying out most activities granting Farming experience.

Title: Purchase the Buckets All The Way Down permanent unlock
Description: Buckets are no longer required to remove compost from a compost bin. It can be purchased from Sydekix at the Garden of Kharid, costing 10,000 Crux Eqal favour.

Title: You gotta catch 'em both, sometime!
Description: After completing the Medium task to find the slimy egg, you are allowed to search Menaphos and Sophanem for the rarely spawning corrupted egg. The soulobby Discord may be able to help.
